name: Ch.13ABaseConvo4
_source: speak;Tana;Gilliam!|There you are.|Still on guard duty, I see.
speak;Gilliam;Princess Tana.|Lady L'Arachel.|Is there something you need?
speak;Larachel;Oh, we were just passing by and noticed your unwavering dedication.|It's truly admirable how you stand guard no matter the hour!
speak;Tana;Don't be so modest, Gilliam!|You've been standing here since dawn.|Most knights would have asked for relief by now.
speak;Gilliam;A knight of Frelia does not abandon his post.|Especially not when protecting the royal family.
speak;Larachel;Such dedication!|The knights of Rausten could learn much from your example, Sir Gilliam.
speak;Gilliam;I...thank you, Lady L'Arachel.|But I'm just doing what any knight would do.
speak;Tana;That's not true and you know it.|You make us all feel so safe when you're on duty.|I've always admired that about you, Gilliam.
speak;Larachel;Indeed!|When monsters lurk and evil threatens, knowing a stalwart defender like yourself stands between us and harm is most reassuring!
speak;Gilliam;You honor me with your words.|But please, there's no need for such praise.
speak;Tana;We're not just saying it, Gilliam.|We truly mean it.|Without you, I'm not sure where we'd be.
speak;Larachel;The divine light of justice shines through your armor, Sir Gilliam!|Your dedication is a beacon to us all!
speak;Gilliam;I...thank you both.|Your words mean more than you know.
speak;Gilliam;Rest assured, I will continue to fulfill my duty.|Leave your protection to me.|No harm shall come to either of you while I stand guard.
speak;Tana;We know we can always count on you, Gilliam.
speak;Larachel;Indeed!|The forces of evil shall tremble before your steadfast vigilance!
speak;Gilliam;Now, if you'll excuse me.|I must return to my watch.|The eastern wall still needs checking.
speak;Tana;Of course.|Don't let us keep you.
speak;Larachel;Onward, brave knight!|May the sacred light guide your path!
speak;Tana;He's always so serious, isn't he?
speak;Larachel;Such is the burden of a true knight!|His dedication is truly inspiring!
